resources.string: Welcome to the English Collective Noun Quiz! In this quiz, you will answer 10 questions from a possible 50. For each question, select the option that most accurately fits the context. \nGood luck!
He looked up and saw a _______ of crows fly by.
Right after the early spring thaw, her vegetable garden was overrun by an ______ of caterpillars.
As he stared at the _______ of monitors, one face leapt out at him.
She had all kinds of figurines in her collection, including a quite large _______ of unicorns.
At his signal, the entire _______ of divers descended into the depths.
They found the _______ of weapons exactly where they had left it.
There was a _______ of monkeys blocking the entrance to the temple.
In this _______ of islands, Honshu is the biggest.
When they lifted the _______ of drawers, Henry lost his grip and it landed on his foot.
And so, the old lioness confronted the _______ of hyenas.
Thinking back, he couldn\'t quite remember how their _______ of friends had formed.
As night fell, the _______ of bats took to the sky.
Careful examination of the evidence revealed that the fires were started by a _______ of arsonists.
Even the ancients knew of this particular _______ of stars.
The _______ of onlookers parted to let the police through.
Even this _______ of thieves had its honour and its own rules.
The _______ of runners were led by the Kenyan, last year\'s champion.
On top of everything, they desperately needed to perform maintenance on their _______ of vehicles.
Adding insult to injury, the old man\'s _______ of geese started to chase him.
Unfortunately for her, that _______ of bananas was unripe.
Their position was overrun by the _______ of savages.
This particular _______ of cockroaches was the densest he had ever seen.
As the _______ of butterflies fluttered by, she could see it was made up of many different species.
There, baking in the sun, was a particularly large _______ of lizards.
The _______ of kangaroos hopped by without taking notice of them.
She tried to ignore the writhing _______ of vipers at her feet.
The Egyptians had a surprisingly large _______ of gods.
As one, the whole _______ of owls opened their eyes.
He fervently wished he didn\'t have to deal with another _______ of dung ever again.
Just off the bow, a _______ of dolphins followed their progress.
The toothless female was pushed out of the _______ of lions.
He went into the night with only his bow and a _______ of arrows.
The group of logs turned out to be a _______ of alligators.
The _______ of coins was heavy in his hands.
He felt so giddy with excitement that he bought everyone a _______ of drinks.
Salivating with hunger, the bear followed the _______ of salmon as they made their way upstream.
The quiet of dawn was shattered by a _______ of gunfire.
A _______ of mosquitoes carried the new strain of malaria across the continent.
An impressive _______ of hummingbirds feasted on the nectar of the new blooms.
His inattention led to them having only a burnt _______ of sausages for dinner.
Using speed and cunning, the _______ of pickpockets gave the police the slip.
Whip them as he may, the drover just couldn\'t get the _______ of oxen to move.
That _______ of flamingos must have numbered in the thousands.
With the wind howling through the open door, the _______ of paratroopers jumped into the inky night.
Running across the clearing, was a _______ of giraffes.
Taking up their places, the _______ of minstrels started tuning their instruments.
No sooner had the lions left the remains of their kill, than the _______ of vultures descended upon it.
He was dumbfounded by the _______ of information at his fingertips.
Far in the distance, the patrol plane spotted the _______ of submarines.
For his trouble, she gave him a _______ of strawberries and a pint of cream.
There are 8 questions in this section. Select the appropriate answer. Press next to advance.
The question will be displayed here.
There is 1 question in this section. Select the incorrect answers, then press Next.
There is 1 question in this section. Type the correct answer, then press Submit.
